author: Cat Ellis
title: Your Fitbit can now help protect you from Covid-19
description: The companion app now offers guidance on keeping healthy with hand-washing reminders and tools for managing stress.
content:
Fitbit is rolling out a set of new features designed to help users protect themselves from Covid-19, and manage stress during the epidemic.
The Fitbit app now offers a new suite of tools to help make life during the pandemic a little easier, with regular han… [+1549 chars]
